subject: Fwd: Thank you, we accepted your refinance appication
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
 
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is our best deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this deal will expire THIS NIGHT):
 
$475,000+ loan
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
 
Hurry, when our best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this simplified form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your your credit report will not disqualify you!
 
http://greenitsealthh.com/
